Oz. 3 Fl. Oz. 3 Fl. Oz. 36 Count / 5 Count Form Suppository Moisturizing Suppository Foam Wash Rinse Spray Suppository / Applicator Description pH-D Boric Acid Suppositories are your go-to for a safe, effective, and holistic solution for odor. pH-D Boric Acid Moisturizing Suppositories are your go-to for a safe, effective, and holistic solution for odor while also moisturizing. pH-D Boric Acid Foam Wash is the only boric acid foam wash on the market. pH-D Boric Acid Foam Wash is pH-balanced, paraben free, and plant-based. Our Instant Odor Rinse is a holistic solution to resolve odor. Use when you want instant freshness before intimacy and during or after your period Freshen up with our lightly scented rose vanilla Boric Acid Body Fresh spray designed to neutralize odor anywhere on the body. This bundle includes one (1) pH-D Boric Acid Suppository 12 count bottle and three (3) Suppository Applicators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No sting, no burn
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several, this is first and only one that does not cause stinging and burning pain. Plus, only brand that truly helps create a healthy, comfortable and clean balance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A whole new world opened up... I never was a big fan of natural or any thing to keep moisture... this stuff doesn't run Stays where it belongs. I love it. I feel so much better since I started using this. My new go to. Oh and absolutely no irritation!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Had Hope Got Slimed
reviews.reviewText: This is really wet and slimy. It would be like taking one of those containers of slime and dumping it in your underwear. Burned a little bit probably due to the boric acid. If they make this similar to slime they should have fun colors too. It really did little to nothing. Once you urinate it will wipe off on the paper and you no longer have it around to do anything. I deal with alot of itching and it did nothing. Was hopeful but hope not proven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, terrible applicator if you’re a bit tight down there
reviews.reviewText: I’m not sure why they designed the tube+applicator like this when this product is targeted for people who struggle with dryness. If you’re dry and tight putting that tube up is a really difficult task, not impossible but very unpleasant. The shape is so not made to go up there. 🙄Besides my complaints about the applicators, this product is great. Really moisturizing, smells so fresh (no fragrance) and makes you feel “healthy” down there. For me it still burns a little bit when I apply it after certain activities *wink* because there are tiny tears that form and I think the boric acid is what makes it burn a bit. It’s just a tiny bit tho, it’s alright.Also today I discovered I can use it as lube!! Just a bit goes along way and it doesn’t dry and pill like other lubes do!Just ordered two more to have in stock

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I feel fresh & moisturized
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’m 41 & postpartum so my body is going through changes. I appreciate that this product is extremely simple to use with simple ingredients. My lady parts are happy and moisturized. The gel has a slippery texture similar to lube so I dabbed a small amount prior to insertion the second time I used it because the applicator is uncomfortable if you are dry down there. Easy fix and I will use it again.Pros:UnscentedNo burningNo leakingEasy applicationGel feels slipperyCons:Shape of the applicator

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this gel a lot! Its so easy to apply and very gentle for the skin. It doesn't have an odor or perfume which is nice. A little also goes a long way and it works well for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Burns sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this product because I was really happy to see the minimal ingredient list without harsh chemicals. I am not why but it did burn my sensitive area and threw of my ph balance so i had to discontinue using this product. So just be careful if you have sensitivities.
